item.title: The Cluster
item.description: So one morning I woke up and went on to the internet and was looking at prices for cloud computing for a project I was getting ready start. Cloud computing has gotten super cheap over the years and it has made the power of a data center available to so many people. Then I got to thinking, what would it take for me to build a cloud in my home. Crazy I know.
